Product.Name: Zelda Jean Legging - Embellished
Product.Description:
Sweet and low on your hips, long and lean on your legs. The slim fit of Zelda brings out your sexy shape. Embellished details include sequins and metallic stitching on the front and back pockets.
  • Slim fit, ultra low rise, our skinniest leg
  • 1-button closure with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with back pocket stitching
  • Sequin and metallic stitching on front and back pockets
  • 81% Cotton/18% Polyester/1% Spandex
  • Hand wash
  • Imported

Product.Name: Modern Boyfriend Crop Jean
Product.Description:
Made to fit a little looser, with inspiration from boy's, these jeans have destructed details and a cuffed hem. Dress these jeans up with sequins and wedges or kick back and relax in a graphic tee and flats.
  • Cropped, looser fit
  • 2-button closure with zip fly
  • 5-pocket styling with destructed details
  • 27" Inseam
  • 98% Cotton/2% Spandex
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Wide Two-Tone Rhinestone Ring
Product.Description:
Row upon row of rhinestone bands. Slip on this statement-making ring for polished style and shine you can see across the room.
  • 83% Zinc alloy/ 17% Glass stones
  • Eleven rows of rhinestone bands
  • Cut-out side detail
  • Polished metal band
  • Sizes 7,8,9
  • Imported

Product.Name: Twisted Back Tank
Product.Description:
A flirty halter style tank with a drape neck and twisted back is a perfect layer by day and sexy tank by night. Beads embellish a soft, sheer layer in the front for just enough detail to dazzle.
  • 60% Cotton/ 40% Modal
  • Drape neck
  • Halter style
  • Twisted strap down the center of the back
  • Beaded details on front
  • Hand wash
  • Imported
